cause.description:
our aim is to raise a any amount of money to support the reconstruction effort in Lebanon,to raise awareness and resources to help Lebanese communities rebuild following the war.
Lebanon is facing now the worst situation ever. standing togather and supporting Lebanon in anyway we find possible can make the difference between life and death
It's important that the people who loves this country support Lebanon through concrete actions, not empty promises
1. Lebanon Is Great With Little Support We Can Let It Live Again
cause.name: Lebanon Rebuild
